name: BUSDX
description: BUSDX is a rewards token that was created on the Binance Smart Chain, with a mechanism that distributes 10% rewards in BUSD to holders automatically. By holding BUSDX, holders will obtain a genuine source of passive income paid out in BUSD (a fiat USD equivalent). BUSDX has also developed a staking DApp and a BUSDX launchpad (Xpad). You will receive 50% APY in BUSDX while your tokens are staked, while still receiving your 10% BUSD rewards! This is cutting edge technology for obtaining Pure Passive Income.
